user_query: Integrate real-time cryptocurrency price data into my application

TaskList.description: Research and identify suitable APIs that provide real-time price data for multiple cryptocurrencies.
Evaluate the selected APIs based on availability of trading volume data, historical performance, and API documentation.
Choose the most suitable API for integration based on previous evaluations.
Implement the integration of the selected API into the application to fetch real-time cryptocurrency prices.
Retrieve and display the trading volume and price of Bitcoin from different exchanges using the integrated API.
